effect.shortEffect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.
effect.full: After each turn, one of this Pok√©mon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.

description.black-white: Raises one stat and lowers another.
description.black-2-white-2: Raises one stat and lowers another.
description.x-y: Raises one stat and lowers another.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Raises one stat and lowers another.
description.sun-moon: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
description.sword-shield: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
